project_descr: Thailand 2011 Flooding Early Recovery & Coordination Support

outputs.output_descr:
In response to the 2011 flooding situation, the objective is for UNDP Thailand, as co-lead of the Thailand Humanitarian Country Team's Early Recovery Cluster, to provide technical advice and support to a framework for needs assessment and and capacity building for early recovery in close collaboration with the responsible Thai counterparts, and in particular the Department of Disaster Prevention and Mitigation (DDPM), Ministry of Interior (MoI).

This initial funding will focus on three outputs: 
i) supporting the UNRC system in coordination and information management and in media communications strategy for the purpose of strengthening the coordination function; 
ii) providing technical advice and support to a framework for needs assessment; and 
iii) planning and technical support and capacity building for early recovery in close collaboration with the responsible Thai counterparts, and in particular DDPM

project_title: thailand 2011 flooding early recovery & coordination sup
